modName: CCL ENB - Colored Lens Camera for low end computers
summary: This ENB REALLY plays with the lens reflection by using a customized bloomfile and a optimized series file. If you like dont like the original ENB lens reflections and want to have a "more realistic" lens than a "computer animated lens effect", well, you gotta check out this one. And like all ENBs by LaBeatBeatbox, this one goes in
descriptionHtml:
The original ENB lenses got some weird sizes, you gotta admit this FACT. I customised all four lenses
in size, orientation and coloration to create a beautiful, yet believable lens flare effect, which also gives you a cozy atmosphere wherever you are.

Features:
- Realistic lighting (no lighting mod required)
- better saturated colors that stick to the original feel
- unique Lens effects
- natural amount of bloom (you can actually see it, but it should never block your sight)
- minimal fps loss (if you can play vanilla skyrim without problems, you will not be able to notice it.)

Requirements:
nothing more than the ENB itself, which you can get by just using this link:
http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0102.htm

Installation:
Just click on the readme
its really that simple...

Recommended:
Dynavision by Gopher and MyGoodEye
for the awesome no-fps-loss depth of field effect you definately gonna enjoy, even without enb!

Use torches at night, its dark out there...
And use the mod "Lanterns on the Roads" by Svabbarjack
get this mod here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10143/?


credits:
ENB - Boris Vorontsov
Skyrim - Bethesda
Dynavision - Gopher and MyGoodEye
Lanterns on the roads - Svabbarjack
author: LaBeatBeatbox
